warscrolls.name: Beast of Nurgle
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Attention Seekers
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, pick the closest enemy unit to it to be the target. If 2 or more enemy units are tied to be the closest, you can pick which is the target. Then, make a charge roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: This unit can move a distance up to the value of the charge roll. It can move through the combat ranges of enemy units and must end that move within 1/2" of the target. Then, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. This unit has charged.

warscrolls.name: Belga the Cystwitch
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Priest (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Ruptured Cysts
abilities.declare: Pick a visible **DISEASED** enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, inflict 1 mortal damage on each other **DISEASED** enemy unit within 3" of the target. If the chanting roll was 9+, you can also pick a friendly **PLAGUEBEARERS** unit within 12" of the target. For each enemy **INFANTRY** model slain by this ability this turn, you can return 1 slain model to that friendly unit.

abilities.name: Scry the Filth
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects to apply for the rest of the turn:

• Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE WIZARDS** while they are within 3" of this unit.
• Add 1 to chanting rolls for friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE PRIESTS** while they are within 3" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Bloab Rotspawned
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Bilespurter’s Claws** is 3.

abilities.name: Miasma of Pestilence
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, other than the **Companion** weapon ability, weapon abilities for attacks that target that friendly unit have no effect.

abilities.name: Daemon Flies
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **MONSTER** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Cankerborn
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Entropy Endures
abilities.effect: If this unit has 2 models and would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, 1 model in this unit is slain.

abilities.name: From the Tainted Earth
abilities.effect:
Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again more than 9" from all enemy units and wholly within 3" of:

• An objective or terrain feature that has a friendly **Pestilent Pollutant**, or

• A **POLLUTED** terrain feature (see Gelgus Pust’s warscroll), or
• An objective you control.

abilities.name: Utter Defilement
abilities.declare: This unit’s **Pestilent Pollutants** are tokens. This unit has 2 **Pestilent Pollutants**. Pick an objective or terrain feature within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place 1 of this unit’s **Pestilent Pollutants** next to the target. If both of this unit’s **Pestilent Pollutants** are already on the battlefield, pick 1 of them, remove it from the battlefield and place it next to the target instead.

warscrolls.name: Epidemius, Tallyman of Nurgle
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Tallyman of Nurgle
abilities.effect:
You gain a number of **tally points** equal to the current battle round number.

During the battle round, you can spend your **tally points**. For each **tally point** you spend, you can re-roll 1 hit roll, 1 wound roll, 1 save roll or 1 ward roll for a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit wholly within 12" of this unit.

At the end of the battle round, any unspent **tally points** are lost.

warscrolls.name: Feculent Gnarlmaw
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle

abilities.name: Rot-Blossom
abilities.effect: Friendly **ROTBRINGERS** units have **WARD (5+)** while they are wholly within 12" of this terrain feature

abilities.name: Tendrils of Corruption
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the phase, this terrain feature has a Move characteristic of 3" and can immediately move 3". It cannot move through or end that move within the combat ranges of enemy units and it cannot end that move on an objective or another terrain feature.

**Designer’s Note:** *This terrain feature cannot use* **RUN**, **RETREAT** *or* **CHARGE** *abilities.*

abilities.name: Riddled With Disease
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE DAEMON** unit wholly within 12" of this terrain feature uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 1 additional rally roll of D6. If that unit is a non-**HERO** unit, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6 instead.

warscrolls.name: Festus the Leechlord
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Scumboil Pox
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **WIZARD** or **PRIEST** within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the target’s power level, to a minimum of 0, until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Delightful Brews, Splendid Restoratives
abilities.declare: Pick a visible unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: If the target is a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit, **Heal (D3)** the target. If the target is an enemy unit, roll a dice. On a 3+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Festus the Leechlord
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Gathoblyt’s Fanged Maw** is 3.

abilities.name: Annelid Engorgement
abilities.effect: For each enemy unit that was in combat with this unit this turn and was destroyed this turn, this unit gains D3 **leech points** for the rest of the battle. Add 1 to this unit’s Control characteristic for each **leech point** it has.

abilities.name: Vile Poisons and Debilitating Toxins
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit did not charge this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target. You cannot pick a **MANIFESTATION** or terrain feature.
abilities.effect:
You and your opponent must roll off. Add this unit’s Control characteristic to your roll and the target’s Control characteristic to your opponent’s roll. If your roll is higher, apply the corresponding effect:

• If the target is a **HERO** or **MONSTER**, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the difference between your roll and your opponent’s roll.

• If the target is a non-**HERO** non‑**MONSTER** unit, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: The Leechlord's Curse
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: This unit gains 1 **leech point**. Until the start of your next turn, each time the target uses a **CORE** ability or command, after that ability has been resolved, roll a dice. On a 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. Then, if any damage points were allocated to the target by this ability, **Heal (1)** this unit.

warscrolls.name: Gelgus Pust
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Fly, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Polluting Aura
abilities.effect:
While a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit is wholly within 6" of a **POLLUTED** terrain feature, each time that unit uses or is the target of an ability that would heal 1 or more damage points, add 1 to the number of damage points healed.

While an enemy unit is within 6" of a **POLLUTED** terrain feature, each time that unit uses or is the target of an ability that would heal 1 or more damage points, subtract 1 from the number of damage points healed, to a minimum of 0.

abilities.name: Parasitic Infestation
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Master Contaminator
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a terrain feature within 6" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target has the **POLLUTED** keyword for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Grin of the Grandfather
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice for each target. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Control characteristic, pick 1 of the following to apply for the rest of the turn:

• Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s combat attacks.
• Subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks.
• Subtract 1 from the target’s Control characteristic.

warscrolls.name: Grandfather's Gardeners
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Standard Bearer, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Blooming Plague
abilities.declare: Pick an objective that is contested by this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target is **seeded with rot** for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Seeds of Rot
abilities.effect: When using the ‘Blessed by the Plaguefather’ ability, if you choose to infect an enemy unit, you can pick an enemy unit that is contesting an objective that is **seeded with rot**.

warscrolls.name: Great Unclean One
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Colossal Blight Weapons** is 3.

abilities.name: Bloated with Corruption
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: If this unit is damaged, pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Locus of Nurgle
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE DAEMON** unit that started the battle with 3 or more models and that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 6" of this unit or a friendly **Feculent Gnarlmaw** and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Plague Wind
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target. You cannot pick a **MANIFESTATION** or terrain feature. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target has the **DISEASED** keyword.

warscrolls.name: Gutrot Spume
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Flailing Tentacles
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **INFANTRY HERO** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has **STRIKE‑LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Pestilential Beachhead
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **aboard the Slime Fleet**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit on the battlefield, wholly within 7" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units. Then set up every other friendly unit that is **aboard the Slime Fleet** on the battlefield wholly within 7" of a battlefield edge, wholly within 7" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Master of the Slime Fleet
abilities.declare: Pick a regiment led by this unit to be the target if no units from that regiment have been deployed.
abilities.effect: Each unit in the target regiment is set up in reserve **aboard the Slime Fleet**. Those units have now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Harbinger of Decay
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), Cavalry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Omens of Decay
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract twice the current battle round number from the target’s control score for the rest of the turn. If the chanting roll was 10+, this ability affects all enemy units within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Knell of Doom
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Enemy Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. If the target is within 6" of a friendly **Sloven Knights** unit, you can roll a D6 instead. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Control characteristic, subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target’s attacks until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Horticulous Slimux
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Cavalry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Gnarlmaw Whisperer
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Feculent Gnarlmaw** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 3" from all enemy units, objectives and other terrain features.

abilities.name: Beast Handler
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Beast of Nurgle** unit that has been destroyed.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, set up a replacement unit wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Cultivating the Garden of Nurgle
abilities.effect: If there is no more than 1 friendly **Feculent Gnarlmaw** on the battlefield, you can set up a **Feculent Gnarlmaw** wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 3" from all enemy units, objectives and other terrain features.

warscrolls.name: Lord of Afflictions
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Master of Rot Flies
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick this unit and up to 2 friendly **Pusgoyle Blightlords** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the targets’ **Rot Fly’s Mouthparts and Sting** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Vectors of Foulest Contagion
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Lord of Blights
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Festering Bulwark
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and a friendly **Putrid Blightkings** unit within 3" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore negative modifiers to save rolls for the targets for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Thrice-ripened Death's Heads
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit or with a friendly **Plague Drones** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll D3. On 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Lord of Plagues
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Sevenfold Slaughter
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Rotswords** unit that did not charge this turn and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s **Ruined Master-crafted Weapons** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Lord of the Blightkings
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **Rotswords** units that did not charge this turn while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Morbidex Twiceborn
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Tripletongue’s Claws** is 3.

abilities.name: Gigantic Nurgling-kin
abilities.effect: **Heal (X)** this unit, where **X** is half the number of damage points this unit has (rounding up).

abilities.name: Tide of Nurglings
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 2 friendly **Nurglings** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice for each target. On a 2+:
• If the target is not in combat, it can move a number of inches equal to the roll but cannot end that move in combat.
• If the target is in combat, it can make a pile-in move.

abilities.name: Lord of Nurglings
abilities.effect:
While any friendly **Nurglings** units are wholly within 12" of this unit:
• Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to that **Nurglings** unit each phase.
• That **Nurglings** unit can ignore the effect of the ‘Beast’ ability.

warscrolls.name: Nurglings
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Endless Swarm
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if it has been destroyed.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit wholly within 6" of a friendly **Feculent Gnarlmaw** and more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Orghotts Daemonspew
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Whippermaw’s Claws** is 3.

abilities.name: Grasping Tongue
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** units that target that enemy unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Acid Ichor
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Pestigors
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Bestial Desecration
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons while it is not within enemy territory.

warscrolls.name: Plague Drones
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/3), Standard Bearer (1/3), Fly, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Ripe Pastures
abilities.effect: This unit can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RETREAT** ability in the same turn. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on this unit by **RETREAT** abilities.

abilities.name: Dispersed Formation
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Plaguebearers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Cloud of Flies
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit while it is contesting an objective you control.

warscrolls.name: Pox-Wretches
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Contagious Catarrh
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: If this unit has any **Mire Kelpies**, pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target. You cannot pick a **MANIFESTATION** or terrain feature.
abilities.effect: Pick any number of this unit’s **Mire Kelpies** and remove them from the battlefield. Then, roll a dice, adding 1 to the roll for each **Mire Kelpie** you removed this phase. On an unmodified roll of 1, this ability has no effect. On a 6+, the target has the **DISEASED** keyword.

abilities.name: Mire Kelpies
abilities.effect: This unit’s **Mire Kelpies** are tokens. There are 6 **Mire Kelpies** for every 14 models in this unit.

warscrolls.name: Poxbringer, Herald of Nurgle
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Captain of the Plague Legions
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **Plaguebearers** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Pusgoyle Blightlords
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Relentless Attackers
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s **Flyrider’s Arsenal** for attacks that target units contesting an objective.

abilities.name: Dispersed Formation
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Pusgoyle Blightlords (1 model)
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Relentless Attackers
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s **Flyrider’s Arsenal** for attacks that target units contesting an objective.

abilities.name: Dispersed Formation
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Putrid Blightkings
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Discomfiting Stench
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **WIZARD** or **PRIEST** within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice.

• If the target is a **WIZARD** and the roll exceeds the target’s power level, until the start of your next turn, each time a casting roll for the target includes 2 or more rolls of 1, 2 or more rolls of 2 or 2 or more rolls of 3, the spell is miscast.

• If the target is a **PRIEST** and the roll exceeds the target’s power level, until the start of your next turn, each time your opponent makes an unmodified chanting roll of 1 or 2 for the target, the prayer fails, its effect is not resolved and your opponent must remove D3 ritual points from the target.

warscrolls.name: Rotbringer Sorcerer
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Tainted Sorceries
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that was picked to be the target of a spell that was successfully cast by this unit this phase to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, subtract 1 from ward rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Rotigus
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Gnarlrod** is 3.

abilities.name: Mountain of Loathsome Flesh
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, roll a dice. On a 3+, pick a visible enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Deluge of Nurgle
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the enemy targets, then pick each friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit within 18" of this unit to be the friendly targets. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Inflict 1 mortal damage on each enemy target and **Heal (1)** each friendly target.

Then, until the start of your next turn, while they are within 18" of this unit, enemy units cannot use or be picked to be the target of any abilities that heal or return slain models to a unit.

abilities.name: Bringer of Plenty
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE**  units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Rotmire Creed
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/10), Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Virulent Concoctions
abilities.effect: When picking an enemy unit to be the target of the ‘Infect’ effect of the ‘Blessed by the Plaguefather’ ability, you can pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it by this unit’s shooting attacks this turn to be the target, even if that unit is not within 7" of any friendly **MAGGOTKIN** **OF NURGLE** units. You cannot pick a **MANIFESTATION** or terrain feature.

warscrolls.name: Rotswords
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Sweat-Soaked and Reeking
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Rotigus
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Gnarlrod** is 3.

abilities.name: Tentacular Grip
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Save characteristic, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Befouled Rainfall
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from save rolls for enemy units while they are within 6" of this unit.

abilities.name: Virulent Downpour
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Add 3" to the range of this unit’s ‘Befouled Rainfall’ ability for the rest of the battle. This unit can be affected by this ability multiple times and the effects are cumulative.

Then, inflict 1 mortal damage on each enemy unit within range of that ability.

abilities.name: Bringer of Plenty
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.

warscrolls.name: Shaman Foulhoof
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Purulent Profusion
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Rampant Defilement
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Pestigors** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Sloppity Bilepiper, Herald of Nurgle
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Jolly Gutpipes
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE DAEMON** unit wholly within 12" of this unit or a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
If you picked a friendly unit to be the target, roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Control characteristic, add 2 to run rolls and charge rolls for the target until the start of your next turn.

If you picked an enemy unit to be the target, roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Control characteristic, until the start of your next turn, while this unit is on the battlefield, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target:

• Each time the target ends a move further from this unit than it was at the start of the move, after the ability used by the target has been resolved.
• Each time the target is removed from the battlefield and set up again on the battlefield further from this unit than it was before it was removed, after the ability used by the target has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Sloven Knights
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Pall of Exhaustion
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the target is in combat with any other friendly **ROTBRINGERS** units. On a 3+, the target has **STRIKE‑LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Spoilpox Scrivener, Herald of Nurgle
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Keep Counting, I'm Watching You
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Plaguebearers** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D6. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn:

***Tally of Blows:*** Add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks.
***Recorded Stamina:*** Add 5 to the target’s control score.

abilities.name: Stupefying Sneezes
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **MONSTER** that had any damage points allocated to it this phase by this unit’s shooting attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target cannot use **RAMPAGE** abilities until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: The Glottkin
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Ward (6+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Ghurk’s Tentacle** is 3.

abilities.name: Horrific Opponent
abilities.effect: Subtract 5 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Blighted Stampede
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared the ‘Counter-charge’ command for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick up to 2 friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets. After the ‘Counter-charge’ command for this unit has been resolved, if this unit charged, each of the targets can immediately use the ‘Counter‑charge’ command in an order of your choosing without any command points being spent.

abilities.name: Overgrowth of Flesh
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the target’s Health characteristic. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target, to a maximum of 7 mortal damage. If any mortal damage was inflicted on the target, and the target was not a Manifestation or terrain feature, it has the **DISEASED** keyword.

abilities.name: Tentacle Trap
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** or **MONSTER** in combat with this unit to be the target
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 4+, for the rest of the turn:

• The target cannot move and cannot be removed from the battlefield by an ability that would allow it to be set up elsewhere on the battlefield.
• Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks that target that enemy unit.

warscrolls.name: The Wurmspat
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Retchling
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit’s **Fecula Flyblown** is on the battlefield, add 1 to its power level for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Fecula Flyblown
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Fecula Flyblown** is on the battlefield, it has **WIZARD (1)**.

rules.name: Plague Progenitor
rules.declare: Pick an enemy unit on the battlefield to be the **plague progenitor** for the rest of the battle. You cannot pick a **MANIFESTATION** or terrain feature.
rules.effect:
Roll 2D3. On a 6, or if the roll equals or exceeds the **plague progenitor**’s Health characteristic, it has the **DISEASED** keyword.

In the first battle round, while the plague progenitor has the **DISEASED** keyword, it cannot use or be picked to be the target of any abilities that could heal or return slain models to it.

Each time the **plague progenitor** is picked to be the target of the ‘Spread’ effect of the ‘Blessed by the Plaguefather’ ability, inflict D3 mortal damage on each other enemy unit within its combat range, excluding **MANIFESTATIONS** and terrain features, in addition to the effect of that ability.

rules.name: Denizens of the Garden
rules.effect: **Companion** weapons used by friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** units have **Crit (2 Hits)**.

rules.name: Filth-laden Daemonic Blooms
rules.effect: Each time you make a run roll for a friendly non-**MONSTER MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE DAEMON** unit, you can change that roll to a 4.

rules.name: Vectors of Contagion
rules.effect: Add 5 to the control scores of friendly non-**HERO ROTBRINGERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE DAEMON** units.

spells.name: Gift of Disease
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are in combat with the chanter. In addition, if the chanting roll was 10+, each enemy unit in combat with the chanter, excluding **MANIFESTATIONS** and terrain features, has the **DISEASED** keyword.

spells.name: Bloated with Sickness
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** Priest to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly non-**MONSTER MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit wholly within 12" of the chanter to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to the target in each phase. If the chanting roll was 10+, you can pick another eligible unit to be a second target.

spells.name: Favoured Poxes
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of the chanter to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 2 from charge rolls for the target. If the chanting roll was 10+, until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1, instead.

spells.name: Frothing Mucus
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the **Charge (+1 Damage)** weapon ability has no effect on combat attacks that target the target. If the chanting roll was 6+, weapon abilities other than the **Companion** weapon ability have no effect instead.

spells.name: Infectious Surge
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Add 2" to the target’s Move characteristic for the rest of the turn. In addition, if the chanting roll was 6+, for the rest of the turn, the target can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

spells.name: Agonising Vomiting
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Roll 7 dice. If the chanting roll was 6+, add 2 to each roll. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

spells.name: Fleshy Abundance
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:
• **Heal (D3)** the target.
• Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target that friendly unit until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Crippling Despair
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: The target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

spells.name: Cloying Quagmire
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:
•  Halve the target’s Move characteristic.
•  If the target’s Save characteristic is 3+ or better, subtract 1 from run rolls and charge rolls for the target.

artefacts.name: Cankerous Nail
artefacts.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons.

artefacts.name: The Witherstave
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

artefacts.name: The Carrion Dirge
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
artefacts.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 18" of this unit to be the targets.
artefacts.effect: Subtract 5 from each target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

artefacts.name: Rustfang
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** or **MONSTER** in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Subtract 1 from save rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Utterly Disgusting
heroicTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Corpulent Avalanche
heroicTraits.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick a visible enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect:
Roll a number of dice equal to this unit’s Move characteristic. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

If any damage points were allocated to the target by this ability, this unit can move 2D3". It can move through the combat ranges of enemy units but must end that move in combat with the units it was already in combat with at the start of the move.

heroicTraits.name: Living Plague
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
heroicTraits.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.

heroicTraits.name: Unctuous Preacher
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is not a **PRIEST**, it has **PRIEST (1)**. If this unit is already a **PRIEST**, add 1 to chanting rolls for this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Grandfather's Blessing
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is in combat with a **Diseased** enemy unit, **Heal (D3)** this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Gift of Febrile Frenzy
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a visible friendly non-**HERO MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit that is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Overpowering Stench
heroicTraits.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect:
You and your opponent must roll off. If your roll is higher, pick 1 of the following effects to apply for the rest of the turn:

• Ignore positive modifiers to save rolls for the target.
• Subtract 1 from ward rolls for the target.

other.name: The Piper's Infectious Melodies
other.effect: While a **Beast of Nurgle** in this Regiment of Renown is within 3" of this Regiment of Renown’s **Sloppity Bilepiper**, it can use the ‘Attention Seekers’ ability even if the other **Beast** **of Nurgle** in this Regiment of Renown has already used it this turn.

other.name: Blighted Growth
other.effect: Set up this Regiment of Renown’s **Feculent Gnarlmaw** wholly within friendly territory and more than 3" from all objectives and other terrain features. After you have done so, it has been deployed.

other.name: Multitudinous Diseases
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
other.declare: If this Regiment of Renown’s **Plaguebearers** unit is wholly within 12" of this Regiment of Renown’s **Feculent Gnarlmaw**, pick that **Plaguebearers** unit to be the target.
other.effect: **Heal (1)** the target. If the target is contesting an objective, you can also return 1 slain model to the target unit.

other.name: Incubation Period
other.declare: This ability must be used to deploy this Regiment of Renown.
other.effect: Set up the units in this Regiment of Renown in reserve **festering within**. They have now been deployed.

other.name: Bursting With Life
other.effect: If a friendly non-**NURGLE’S GIFT** unit would be destroyed, before the last model is removed from play, roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll for each other friendly non-**NURGLE’S GIFT** unit that has been destroyed this battle. On a 5+, pick a friendly unit that is **festering within** and set it up wholly within 6" of that model. It can be set up in combat.

other.name: Nauseating Convalescence
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Hero Phase
other.effect: **Heal (1)** each unit in this Regiment of Renown.

other.name: Fog of Despair
other.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target units in this Regiment of Renown while they are wholly within 9" of the **Harbinger of Decay** in this Regiment of Renown.

battleTraits.name: Revolution and Revulsion
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round
battleTraits.declare: You must use this ability at the start of each battle round.
battleTraits.effect:
If it is the first battle round, roll a dice to determine which **CYCLE** ability is ripe for the rest of the battle round.

1 ‘Unnatural Vitality’
2 ‘Fecund Vigour’
3 ‘Burgeoning Filth’
4 ‘Plague of Misery’
5 ‘Nauseous Revulsion’
6 ‘Rampant Disease’
7 ‘Corrupted Regrowth’

If it is not the first battle round, the next **CYCLE** ability in the sequence is ripe for the rest of the battle round. If the ‘Corrupted Regrowth’ ability was ripe last battle round, the ‘Unnatural Vitality’ ability is ripe this battle round.

You can only use a **CYCLE** ability if it is ripe. Only 1 **CYCLE** ability is ripe each battle round.

battleTraits.name: Unnatural Vitality
battleTraits.effect: Friendly non-**MONSTER CYCLE OF CORRUPTION HEROES** have **WARD (4+)**.

battleTraits.name: Fecund Vigour
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase

battleTraits.name: Burgeoning Filth
battleTraits.effect: Subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with any friendly **CYCLE OF CORRUPTION** units.

battleTraits.name: Plague of Misery
battleTraits.effect: While enemy units are within 12" of any friendly **CYCLE OF CORRUPTION** units, they cannot use abilities that heal or return slain models to a unit.

battleTraits.name: Nauseous Revulsion
battleTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from charge rolls for enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Rampant Disease
battleTraits.effect: Melee weapons used by friendly non-**HERO CYCLE OF CORRUPTION** units have **Crit (2 Hits)**.

battleTraits.name: Corrupted Regrowth
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.effect:
**Heal (7)** each friendly **Feculent Gnarlmaw**.

If there are no friendly **Feculent Gnarlmaws** on the battlefield, you can set up a **Feculent Gnarlmaw** on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units and more than 3" from all objectives and other terrain features.

battleTraits.name: Blighted Regrowth
battleTraits.declare: You can use this ability if there are no friendly **Feculent Gnarlmaws** on the battlefield.
battleTraits.effect: Set up a **Feculent Gnarlmaw** on the battlefield wholly within 12" of an objective you control and more than 3" from all enemy units, objectives and other terrain features.

battleTraits.name: Blessed by the Plaguefather
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

***Infect:*** Pick an enemy unit within 7" of any friendly Maggotkin of Nurgle units to be the target. You cannot pick a **MANIFESTATION** or terrain feature.
• If the target is in combat with any friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** units, it has the **DISEASED** keyword.
• If the target is not in combat with any friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** units, roll a dice. On a 4+, the target has the **DISEASED** keyword.

***Spread:*** Pick a **DISEASED** enemy unit to be the target. Each other enemy unit within the target’s combat range, excluding **MANIFESTATIONS** and terrain features, has the **DISEASED** keyword.

***Mutate:*** If all enemy units on the battlefield, excluding **MANIFESTATIONS** and terrain features, have the **DISEASED** keyword, inflict 1 mortal damage on each of them.

battleTraits.name: Wracked with Disease
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.declare: Pick each **DISEASED** enemy unit to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on each target.

battleTraits.name: Ceaseless Infectors
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.declare: Pick an enemy unit that was in combat with a friendly **ROTBRINGERS** unit that was destroyed this turn to be the target. You cannot pick a **MANIFESTATION** or terrain feature.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has the **DISEASED** keyword.

battleTraits.name: Burst Pustules
battleTraits.effect: Each time a **DISEASED** enemy unit is destroyed, before the last model in the unit is removed from play, roll a dice. On a 3+, pick another enemy unit within 9" of that model to be the target. You cannot pick a **MANIFESTATION** or terrain feature. The target has the **DISEASED** keyword.

battleTraits.name: Desperate Remedies
battleTraits.effect: If an ability would heal or return slain models to a **DISEASED** enemy unit, that ability does not heal or return any slain models to it. Instead, it no longer has the **DISEASED** keyword.
